name: Vista del Rey
description: Vista Del Rey (English: View of the King or King's View) is one of the sub-districts of Heywood, located in central Night City. After the Fourth Corporate War, this part of Night City turned into a Combat Zone. Most of the area was occupied by the old Little China and Japantown, though most of its originals residents had already moved out to other parts of the city. The original Heywood was in a different location to the southeast, packed with refugees and divided between a poorer south area...
